channel.title: eLogii News - Delivery and Field Service Management News

item.title: Unimasters chooses eLogii to introduce route optimisation
item.description: Unimasters chooses eLogii, the leading next-generation Delivery Management platform to introduce fully interactive, dynamic planning and route optimisation in the first and last mile

item.title: 7 Key Metrics in Delivery Logistics to Measure for Success
item.description: Oftentimes, it is difficult to determine the success of delivery logistics.
